about_the_game:
Mysplaced is an enchanting action-adventure game that invites you to explore a beautifully crafted 3D world filled with mysteries, challenges, and surprises. Dive into an immersive experience where exploration, combat, and storytelling come together seamlessly.

Explore dynamic environments filled with puzzles, treasures, and exciting encounters across diverse biomes, including lush forests, scorching deserts, snowy landscapes, molten lava fields, and towering mountainous regions. Unlock new abilities, master combat, and harness the chemistry system to interact with the world in clever ways. The soul system adds layers of challenge and depth, rewarding exploration and strategy.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Exploration: Journey through interconnected areas brought to life with stunning visuals, including forest, desert, snow, lava, and mountainous biomes, each filled with secrets and surprises.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve a variety of creative puzzles that test your wits and ingenuity.

  • Engaging Combat: Battle diverse enemies using intuitive controls and unlock powerful abilities to enhance your skills.

  • High-Stakes Progression: Experience the thrill of a soul system that ties your progression to mastery, rewarding skillful play and thoughtful decision-making.

  • Chemistry System: Experiment with environmental interactions to uncover new solutions and gameplay possibilities.

  • Mini-Games: Enjoy a variety of fun and rewarding mini-games that add a fresh layer of excitement to your adventure.

Whether you’re unraveling the mysteries of the story, overcoming challenging puzzles, or mastering the art of combat, Mysplaced offers a thrilling and unforgettable action-adventure experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14.7.1 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 30 FPS at 1920x1080 resolution using the "Low" preset (fluid fire system disabled).
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest macOS
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro or better
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 60 FPS at 2K resolution with the "High" preset (fluid fire system enabled).

name: Mysplaced

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit, version 1903 or later) / Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 Super 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT 6GB / Intel Arc A580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 30 FPS at 1920x1080 resolution using the "Low" preset (fluid fire system disabled).
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit, version 1903 or later) / Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 8GB / AMD Radeon RX 6800 16GB / Intel Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 60 FPS at 4K resolution with the "Ultra" preset (fluid fire system enabled).
